trends: There have been no other sightings in Gunpo-si
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Flash and Bullet of shapes UFO
divs: Sighting DetailsI don't speak English well. so, My story is very short. I sow a UFO 5pm46~8min. Korea is spring now. sky is clean. There was no cloud and no high-buildings. I was in the bus on the roads. The bus was moving, and front of tunnelentrance. The bus had clean windows. Suddenly, A small flash came into my sight to high-sky. When i found the light, slowly fade away. But there was something remained. That's shape was lie down baguette or Bullet. Color was White. there was continues until when i came out from tunnel. The ufo didn't have any motion and sound.
